column2: although Ronaldo attempted to claim it as a header. Uruguay had a few chances to equalize
column4: Suarez and De Arrascaete coming close
column5: and Gimenez being called for a handball. Fernandes then converted the penalty kick
column6: and almost completed a hat-trick in stoppage time
column7: but his shot hit the post.
